resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time W2 employment).

Languages: Java 

Frameworks: Spring(Boot, Data, IOC, DI, Security, Cloud), Hibernate, JDBC, Express 

Web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, XML, AJAX 

Web Services: RESTful API, Microservices, 

Microservices/Cloud: Digital Ocean, AWS, Kafka, 

Databases: MSSQL, MySQL, PostGreSQL MongoDB 

Design Patterns: Singleton, Factory, Observer, Builder, CQRS 

Testing: Junit, Mockito, TDD 

Tools: Intellij IDE, Maven, PuTTy, GIT, WinSCP

Dedicated software developer having 5+ years of professional experience using analytical thinking, creative problem solving, and project management skills to engineer and deliver high-quality software solutions. \n\nJava development with a good history of working with core java for a major portion of my career. Proven skills in planning application architecture, then developing, integrating, and delivering robust, scalable components which meet all business needs using Java, JavaScript, Spring, REST, MySQL, IntelliJ, Maven, Postman, and Git.
